features: PACKAGING MAY VARY: Every package of WaterWipes Textured Clean Wipes still contains the same pure and trusted water-based wipes.

PURE, SIMPLE FORMULA: Our fragrance-free Textured Clean baby wipes are clinically proven to clean and help protect baby’s delicate skin with just 3 ingredients: 99.9% purified water plus a drop of fruit and berry extract.

TEXTURED FOR TOUGHER MESSES: As babies grow, so do the messes. The soft, textured surface of water wipes provides added cleaning power to tackle messes on hands, faces and bottoms, making them perfect for growing babies and toddlers.
PLANT-BASED, HYPOALLERGENIC WIPES: Our Original baby wipes are plant-based and plastic-free. Plus, they're hypoallergenic, unscented, and contain no artificial fragrances, parabens or sulfates.

TRUSTED BY DERMATOLOGISTS: Suitable for eczema-prone skin and allergy sufferers, WaterWipes are accepted by the National Eczema Association of America, Dermatologically Approved by the Skin Health Alliance and registered by the Vegan Society.

MORE EVERYDAY USES: WaterWipes are versatile for adults, pets, and surfaces too. These disposable wet wipes are ideal for cleaning small messes, refreshing skin, and wiping pets' paws, making them a convenient travel essential for on-the-go use.
body.description: Families can trust WaterWipes Textured Clean 240 count (4 packs) to gently clean and help protect sensitive skin. Our new Plastic-Free Textured Clean toddler and baby wipes are the same formula and purity as before, with just 3 ingredients: 99.9% ultra-purified water and a drop of fruit and berry extract to naturally cleanse the skin. Our purified water goes through a 7-step process that makes it purer than tap, boiled or medical grade water to provide a deeper, more effective clean.* Our wipes have a soft, textured surface to tackle messes on hands, faces and bottoms, making them perfect for growing toddlers and babies at home and on the go. WaterWipes was created by a father, inspired by a daughter. Our founder developed WaterWipes after his newborn suffered from bad diaper rash, and he realized skin this pure needs care that’s just as pure. So, he created the world’s purest wipes to help protect his child and help other parents do the same for theirs. Now families around the world trust pure and simple WaterWipes for all kinds of messes. These plastic-free wipes are gentle on the planet, and they’re clinically proven to be kind on baby’s skin, giving parents the confidence to help protect their children in the purest way possible. *When compared to cloth and water

They're the same formula and size as our previous wipes. accredited and accepted brand We're proud that our wipes have been accredited and accepted as gentle and effective at cleaning delicate, sensitive skin by many global organizations pure and simple ingredients While other wipes have as many as 12 ingredients, our Textured Clean Wipes use only 99.9% purified water and a drop of fruit and berry extract.

plant-based† and plastic-free wipes* We believe in taking small steps to help protect the planet your little one will inherit. WaterWipes are now made from 100% viscose, a natural wood pulp fiber that is plant-based† and plastic-free*. †Wipe made from regenerated cellulose (viscose) utilizing wood pulp as a precursor purified water for a deeper, more effective clean* ​Water is nature’s natural cleanser and moisturizer. WaterWipes’ unique 7-step purification process lowers the surface tension of our water, resulting in a deeper clean.* ​ *When compared to cloth and water.

Are WaterWipes the same as previous WaterWipes? We haven’t made any changes to WaterWipes, apart from removing the plastic from the wipe material itself. Now all our wipes are plant-based† and plastic-free*, while offering the same level of comfort on your baby’s delicate skin. How do I dispose of my WaterWipes products? Our wipes are made from plant fibers, so they can be disposed of in your home composting bin or your organic waste bin that is collected and sent for industrial composting. Wipes used for diaper changes should be disposed of with general waste. Are WaterWipes flushable? No, you should never flush any wipes. When should I dispose of my WaterWipes? Because WaterWipes contain minimal ingredients and are now made from 100% viscose, a plant-based† material, our wipes are best used within 4 weeks of opening. †Wipe made from regenerated cellulose (viscose) utilizing wood pulp as a precursor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mostly water, great for baby's skin, no nasty smell NOT MADE IN CHINA LIKE HONEST WIPES!
reviews.reviewText: I don't dislike anything about the Water Wipes. The wipes that are scented are disgusting. It's like poo-pourri or something which is just covering the smell of feces with an even nastier smell. These have no scent and they are 99% water, because duh. What do we use in the shower? Water. We're lucky to not have to bathe in the river or something and have access to fresh, clean water. These wipes mimic a nice, clean, shower. Blowouts? No worries. I don't need five wipes. They get the dirty work done and efficiently. My baby isn't exposed to nasty chemicals that are completely unnecessary. WIN WIN WIN. I used these for my elder child as well. Wish they existed or were sold in America when I had my first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Water wipes for clean comfort
reviews.reviewText: Water wipes cleanes and refreshes your tush without causing any dryness, itching or discomfort. Gentle, yet effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: We have a newborn and these wipes are simply amazing. We use two wipes max for a poopy diaper or pee diaper and really that's all we need. They are pricy but well worth it. Huggies are nice but not wet very dryish moist, pampers break our little one out. Kirkland brand is great but a bit rough. These water wipes are desirable! Even in the wipe warmer maintains the same value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful and Great Product
reviews.reviewText: These are good for adults as well as children. They do not irritate skin. Use them for clean up in the bathroom or for cleaning face at night. I keep a pack in the bathroom and one on the make-up vanity. I have these on subscribe and save so I never run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Non-fragrant wipes, and no chemicals, water, wipes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars On the thin side
reviews.reviewText: I bought these wipes because they are primarily water-based. Many other wipes tend to irritate skin. However, there’s one little frustrating feature - they are a lot thinner than any I’ve ever used, which causes them to flop over on themselves and become difficult to manage. For that reason, I’m not sure I’ll buy this brand again, but maybe the lack of chemicals and reasonable price will sway me in the future - just not sure at this point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells nice and very gentle on baby skin
reviews.reviewText: I love these wipes. They don’t stick together and smell refreshing. They also don’t cause irritation to baby’s skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for adults too!
reviews.reviewText: I found these at the grocery store in a smaller package when there was a coupon. They are much more durable and nicer to your skin than the name brand ‘adult” bathroom wipes. They aren’t flushable, but then again, even plumbers don’t recommend flushing the so-called “flushable” wipes. I definitely recommend these!

These are a must have with babies and kids. I use them all the time to clean their faces and hands. They don’t irritate the skin, are durable and the wetness of them is perfect. Many wipes are too dry or wet, but these are my favorite to use.

Basically any issue your little one has from diaper rashes to eczema, my little ones had it all. We ended up using no baby wipes for the first 8 months with my first after there were nothing that would treat the issues. Once we realized baby wipes were contributing to it, we tried water wipes and they caused no reaction. For our newest one, it has again caused no issues and although they are expensive in comparison to others, we spent more alone on treatment for the reactions of other baby wipes.
Love how these are basically just water! Natural, safe, and cleans up greatN
Got to clean hearing aids, perfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Good Wipe with Good Ingredients
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I like that these are nearly all water. This is first and foremost why I buy them. But, they are also thick and wipe well. They are scentless and gentle on my baby's skin. My only complaint about this product is they don't easily come out of the consider so I usually end up pulling 3 out at a time. If it wasn't for this I would give it five stars. Despite this, I still think they are worth purchasing and I continue to buy them.
